### **PR Type** Enhancement, Tests, Documentation ___ ### **Description** - **Phase 1 Validation Implementation**: Complete package and credential validation system before deployment with npm and PyPI registry checks - **Glama Registry Integration**: Migrated from official MCP registry to Glama API with 12K+ server catalog, sitemap-based discovery, and multi-stage search strategy - **Registry-Based Form Generation**: New endpoint for extracting form fields directly from Glama JSON Schema without LLM analysis - **Comprehensive Test Coverage**: Added 70+ test cases covering package validation, credential validation, and registry form schema generation - **Frontend Registry Browse**: New tabbed interface with RegistryFeed component for browsing and searching MCP servers from registry - **Enhanced Error Handling**: Structured error responses with actionable help messages for deployment failures - **UI Component Library**: New reusable components (Badge, Card, Button, Tabs, Input) with CVA variants and Radix UI primitives - **Database Migration Resilience**: Added retry logic with exponential backoff for PostgreSQL connections - **Complete Roadmap Documentation**: Phase 1-6 roadmap documents defining validation, monitoring, multi-runtime, observability, serverless, and advanced features - **Improved Logging**: Replaced print statements with proper logger usage and added JSON parsing for Claude responses ___ ### Diagram Walkthrough ```mermaid flowchart LR A["Glama Registry API"] -->|"Sitemap Discovery"| B["RegistryService"] B -->|"Form Schema"| C["Forms Endpoint"] C -->|"JSON Schema"| D["FormBuilder"] E["Package Validator"] -->|"npm/PyPI Check"| F["Deployments API"] G["Credential Validator"] -->|"Env Var Check"| F F -->|"Validation Result"| H["Configure Page"] I["RegistryFeed"] -->|"Browse Servers"| J["ServerCard"] J -->|"Deploy"| H K["UI Components"] -->|"Badge, Card, Button, Tabs"| L["Frontend Pages"] ```
